title: Calendar Stone and Codex Mendoza depiction of time

content.question:
The work in the top image is the Calendar Stone from Templo Mayor. The work in the bottom image is the frontispiece of the Codex Mendoza. Both of these works relate to the presentation of time.

What major historical event occurred between the creation of these two works that brought about changes in the presentation of time?

Who was the audience for each work?

Using specific visual and contextual evidence, compare how time is presented in each work.
